ThreeFold Now Marketplace is coming soon!

ThreeFold Now Marketplace is a peer-to-peer alternative to centralized cloud providers, enabling you to deploy independently and keep ownership of your own data. 🙌 Read more within.

Sam Taggart

22 October 2020

ThreeFold Now Marketplace is a peer-to-peer alternative to centralized cloud providers, enabling you to deploy independently and keep ownership of your own data. 🙌

Starting this November you'll be able to choose and test the first tools available on Marketplace, such as discourse, gitea, website, and more.

Stay tuned!

The first five episodes of the ThreeFold podcast are live!

ThreeFold and IETSA partner to bring the decentralized Internet and education initiatives to South Africa.
